sentence.Network_en: She sneaked a surreptitious glance at her watch.
His surreptitious behaviour naturally aroused suspicion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那鬼鬼祟祟的行为自然引起了旁人的怀疑.

sentence.Network_en: He made a surreptitious entrance to the club through the little door in the brick wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从砖墙的小门偷偷进入俱乐部。

词根及词缀 ... reotile n 爬行动物 surreptitious a 鬼鬼祟祟的 subreption n 隐瞒真相.
诡字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 诡谲〖 strangeandchangeful;treacherous〗 诡秘〖 surreptitious;secretive〗 诡笑〖 affectedsmile〗.
surrender 投降,降服surreptitious 秘密,偷盗的surround 包围

list.abs: We surreptitiously logged on to the ESPN Web site ., 我们偷偷上网登入体育专业频道 espn 的网站.
When oo one is look he take a surreptitious puff on his cigarette ., 当没有人看时 , 他偷偷地抽了一口烟.

英语报刊中委婉语的文化折射||大牛英语论文网 ... working to rule( 按制度工作) surreptitious entry( 秘密进入) prison( 监狱).

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'obtained by suppression of the truth'): from Latin surreptitius (from the verb surripere, from sub- 'secretly' + rapere 'seize') + -ous

entry.tran: 秘密的;鬼鬼祟祟的;偷偷摸摸的
entry.def: A surreptitious action is done secretly.

example.ex: He made a surreptitious entrance to the club through the little door in the brick wall...
example.tran: 他从砖墙的小门偷偷进入俱乐部。
他们有过几次秘密会谈。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by quiet and caution and secrecy; taking pains to avoid being observed;
2. conducted with or marked by hidden aims or methods;

auth_sentence.content: We had surreptitious drinks too, although there was prohibition.
auth_sentence.res_content: We had surreptitious drinks too, although there was prohibition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We had surreptitious drinks too, although there was prohibition.

auth_sentence.content: But, to some employees, surreptitious listening is a way of survival.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, to some employees, surreptitious listening is a way of survival.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, to some employees, surreptitious listening is a way of survival.

auth_sentence.content: Rosie took a surreptitious peep at Mark.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rosie took a surreptitious peep at Mark.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rosie took a surreptitious peep at Mark.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越
sur下面+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 隐匿真相, 歪曲事实
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面+rept爬+ion→n.隐匿真相, 歪曲事实

means.word_mean: 偷偷摸摸的,暗中进行的

sentences.en: a surreptitious look at the answers
